name: NATURAL- Raw Crystal Quartz point Necklace
description:
Under a New Light is fascinated by raw stones. So this is an exciting moment to present my -Natural raw stones necklaces- collection!

I mixed these huge raw quartz crystal point with recycled leather and its hang it on vintage raw brass with some layers of raw brass in one of the sides.

Please note that the leather is glued with a resistant glue special for Crystals and leathers. 

A statement piece for the Boho Urban Women out there!

Raw, fascinating & Tribal-Spiritual. That's how it makes me feel!


::Quartz Crystal ::

Please keep in mind that each stone is unique and comes with a different shape and a sight difference in colors. 

Clear Quartz is known as the "master healer" and will amplify energy and thought, as well as the effect of other crystals. It absorbs, stores, releases and regulates energy. 

Zodiac - All birthsigns

Planet – Sun

Element – Fire

Chakras - Crown Chakra


{c o m p o n e n t s}
Vintage brass
Quartz Crystals point (Long: 2 3/8" width: 1 1/8") 

{d i m e n s i o n s}
Total length of the brass: 29"
The brass in the sides is hanging : 2 5/8"

name: NOMAD Necklace- Recycled leather, Beads bones, geometric shape, Native inspired
description:
This unique design comes from a little tribal and soft inspired mood. I made based on geometrical shapes.

I hand-cut a triangular piece of recycled leather and I add a beautiful finding bead bone in a vintage store. I finally added some metallic beads with a vintage bronze chain.


{c o m p o n e n t s}
Bronze antique chain tone -Niquel free-
reclaimed beads bone
Recycled leather
Metallic beads

{d i m e n s i o n s}
The chain is 29 1/2" long.
The tube bead 2"
The triangular leather is 5 cm (sides) -6.00 cm (base) approx the sides

name: INCA Leather Necklace- handpainted leather, vintage solid brass
description:
Hand Painted Necklace - INCA & AZTEC native 100% black leather necklace.
It's hand painted leather necklace & solid vintage brass. A modern tribal piece!

I'm currently exploring my roots and putting a touch of the mystic Peruvian and Aztec crafts in my work.

I'm experimenting with bold pieces inspired by Native Americans.

I've been touched by their wisdom, their spiritual life and their consideration for the interconnectedness of nature elements.

I began by using solid vintage brass to give it the look of the INCA orejeras from the Mochicas. The backside features a painted image symbolizing the AZTEC architecture.

This piece can be worn on those special or spiritual days and in these special occasions where you will look like an INCA princess!

Triangles, circles and lines are everywhere, geometry is always there to influence my pieces.

This necklace consists in a 100% hand-cut recycled leather with a diameter of 3 1/4" which is folded onto itself to get these semi circular sides. On the front side, I put three solid vintage brass pieces and painted the back side.

To give it an even more Native look, I added a vintage snake chain and the same wave black seed beads with some brass tubes.

The whole pendant is hanging on a beautiful vintage chain ornamented with beads and brass tubes.

It makes it a truly unique piece.

{d i m e n s i o n s}
Total length 27" (including the chain + the beads +brass)
Diameter of the leather 3 1/4"
Hanging last seed beads 3 1/2"
Hanging last vintage chain 7 1/2"

Note: 
For orders to be sent directly as a present with a personalized note, please contact me. I will be glad to make this special order!

www.underanewlight.com

name: NATURAL- Raw Crystal Amethyst Citrine Necklace
description:
I mixed this raw amethyst with a raw brass bar to give it a geometrical shape.

::Amethyst Crystals ::

Amethyst is purple quartz, and is a meditative and calming stone. It has a positive effect on the body, the mind and the soul and rings calm, balance, patience, and peace.

::Citrine Crystal ::

Citrine brings happiness, joy and optimism into your life. One of only two minerals on the planet which do not hold or accumulate negative energy, but dispels and transforms it.

{c o m p o n e n t s}
Raw brass bars
Amethyst Crystal point
Citrine Crystal point
